title: ENA Datafile Description
description: Definitions for elements that appear in different stages of a wizard targeted at submissions to the ENA (European Nucleotide Archive) repository. 'ref', id of stage; 'title',  header used for the stage; items, actual form elements on the page; 'apply_to_all', if all items must have same value for this stage;

properties.title: Study Type
properties.message: Select the study type under which the datafiles were created. The study type presents a controlled vocabulary for expressing the overall purpose of the study.

items.help_tip: Select Study Type from the list
items.label: Study Type

properties.title: Sample
properties.message: Select and associate a sample to files in the bundle. A Sample defines an isolate of sequenceable material upon which sequencing experiments has been based.

items.help_tip: Specify the sample you used in your study
items.label: Sample
